code: import React from"react";import{Link,Routes,Route}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles/Dashboard.css";import BrowseCampaigns from"./donor/BrowseCampaigns";import MyDonations from"./donor/MyDonations";import Profile from"./donor/Profile";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DonorDashboard=()=>{const sidebarItems=[{label:"Browse Campaigns",to:""},{label:"My Donations",to:"my-donations"},{label:"Profile",to:"profile"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{className:"sidebar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:sidebarItems.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:item.to,children:item.label})},idx))})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"main-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{index:true,element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowseCampaigns,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"my-donations",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MyDonations,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"profile",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{})})]})})]});};export default DonorDashboard;
